siyalu denama ohugen wimasa sitiye mema kriyadamaya hondin ho narakin sarthaka kara ganimata thakshanaya kese bhawitha kala hakida yannayi, ee sandaha awashya paryeshana ha nishpadana katayuthu wenuwen pentaganaye adhithakshanika widyagara bhawitha kala haki bawath thawa oona tharam mudalak me wenuwen waya kirimata amerikanu palanadhikariya sudanam bawath awasanaye kese ho mema katayuththa sarthaka wiya yuthu bawath wadi duratath kiya sitiyeya.

ehema eka gayakayakuge githa wenuwen wisheshathwayak dakwuwe naha.

pahath deshapalana wasi thaka fedaral wyawasthawak wenuwen peni sitima saha ee haraha goda nagunu kriyakarakam thulin ratata sidu wu mema winashaye mulata ul pandam dima sadaha bandaranayaka mahatha wisin waga kiwa yuthu we.
mama hithanne api hamogema jiwitha ee wageyi.
warak wasikili hadima bara aragena eeka haduweth natha.
wedanakkhandho, sanynyakkhandho, sangkharakkhandho, winynyanakkhandho – ime wuchchanthi ‘‘arupadhathuya chaththaro khandha’’.
chayarupa - woltar dayarathna - anuradhapura disa wisheshaasala uthsawa samaya nimiththen dewundara shri wishnu dewalaye widuli aaloka pujawa swadeshi samagame anugrahayen sidu karini.
hariyata akkara gananawaka idamaka konakata wenna punchi geyak hadagena padinchi wela idame anik pradeshaya wala bihiwenna arala balagena innawa wage.
me pilibandawa obe lama wisheshagnya mahatha samanga katha karanna.
nawum bawa pennum karanne beri wala prathyasthathawa, dipthiya, beri matha kola pahathi waliga saha stroberi rasayayi.
monahari karala thibboth mama oyawa maranawa.

jayaga්rahi lotharayipatha idiripath kala pudgalaya polisiya wisin athadanguwata gena wimarshana sidu karana bawath wimarshanayen anathuruwa thawath karunu anawaranaya wanu athi bawath kasun jayasuriya mahatha wadiduratath sandahan kaleya.

maha wanshaya parighanaka gatha wuyen ehi rajathuma yana wachanaya dahathundas harasiya wisi hathara warak yedi athi bawa ekthara mahachar yawarayeku prakashayata path kalen ithihasaya saha parighanaka athara mema apuru sambandhaya lowata helikirima hethu kota gena loka ithihasaya gana noyek gatalu sahagatha than nirakaranaya kara ganimata batahirayan dolar miliyan gananak athin wiyadam karan meratata ennata wuyen rata thula widesha sanchitha athishaya ihala yamakata lak wi madaperadiga dhanawathun pawa kuda rakiyawal sandaha meratata adi ennata patan gaththen sanskruthika arbuda kipayak pana nagennata wi wahama otuwan meratata genwima pilibanda jathyanthara pragnyapthiyaka awashyathawaya pana nagunen jathyanthara sahayogaya nomadawa thibu bawin widesha amathyawaraya rupiyal koti hathalis pahak wiyadam kara siya bala diyaniyage upan dina sadayada hawayi dupathe pawathwa erata sanwardhanaya kirimata dhana sampath poli rahitha dimanawak lesa ee ayurin pradanaya kota wadi duratath upades demin sankramanikayan pilibanda mita wada unanduwak dakwiya yuthu bawata palanadhikarayata aagnyawak nikuth kara nawatha diwayinata paminiyeya.
prawina kiyana aya kuhakakama athaarala thaman danna dewal kiyala denna oone..
meyada kisiwitekath anukampawa ayadimak nowe..

me..methana hariyata uuro natala wage" wehesakara aadaraniya satanakata pasu ohu kiwe wachanayen wisthara kala nohi hangum samudayak hada thula therapaganimini."aa...dan kawuda uuro" aya ohuge dasa desa bala sinasune yatithola sapagenaya muhunata dangakara swarupayak aaruta karaganimini ."uurekuyi...eeriyekuyi" ilandariya kiwe ahasa sinasena gamanya.yuwathiya hindagena sitiye thana bissa matha eraminiya gothagenaya.

paudgalikawa ma hatada, thawath boho dena hatada athi wi thibu pramukha gataluwak wu janadhipathiwaranayedi jawipehi bhumikawa gana itha pahadili hoduwawak jawipe nayaka anura kumara disanayaka sahodaraya laba denu labina.jawipe thama nila mathaya thawama srujuwa prakasha nokalada, rajapaksha palanaye durdantha swabhawaya pahadili karana, an siyalu pakshawalata wada nirmanashili pracharaka wada piliwelak jawipehi ithama mathakadi diyath karanu atha.

hayasinth wijesinha mahathmiyage meheya wimen mema wishesha awashyatha athi daruwange dal pandu puhunu wadasatahana aarambhawu athara ehidi handuna ganna daksha daruwan gen samanwitha net bol kandayamak sakas kirimata niyamithaya.wishesha olimpik tharagawaliyata shri lankawa niyojanaya karamin dal pandu kandayamak yomu kirima age aramunaya.

sanwardhana (wishesha awastha) panathe aramuna wanne siyalu wishayayan arabaya jathika prathipaththi sakas kirimath, shri lankawe aarthika sanwardhana katayuthu kadinam kirimath, mema katayuthu ha adala wana wenath hethu saha siduwim walata wadagath wana piyawara ganimath, hi la pahasukam sapayimaya.
indhana genwime patan gabada kirima ha beda harima dakwa pawathinne itha asathutudayaka thaththwayaki.
mahabambaa kiyala kiyanne sithawaka rajasinha rajjuruwo.
eheth me wasare (2013) di nawathath aarthikaya siyayata 7.5 ka wardhanayakata gaman karana bawa maha banku adhipathi ajith niwad kabral mahatha pawasayi.
emenma duppath muslim janathawa athi wegayen thaleyibankaranaya karamin pawathi.
